bios.text:
❤ My heart belongs to you
🌹 Roses are red
💌 My love is true
✨ You're my everything

💑 Together forever
🌈 Our love story continues
📖 Writing our next chapter
💞 Soulmates

👫 Two hearts
💓 One beat
🌌 Our own universe
💘 Crazy in love

🌙 Moonlight and you
✨ Starlight in your eyes
💫 My favorite view
💖 My person

🤗 Hugs from you
💋 Kisses from me
🏡 Home is wherever
❤ We're together

💕 You're my favorite
🌅 Sunrise to sunset
👰‍♂ Future plans include you
💍 Forever yours
